name: Auto Cluth & Break
description: Created from either wood or recycled materials, it can be moulded into just about any shape and hardens to provide a hard shell. Additives can make it water resistant and it can be produced in a rainbow of colours. Other materials being looked at include paper clay, paper glue, paper cotton and even washable paper.
